message_1: In a Dictator Game, Player 1 is given $100 to split with Player 2 in any way they choose. If Player 1 chooses to keep $80 for themselves, how much money will Player 2 receive?
message_2: Player 2 will receive $20. Since Player 1 keeps $80 out of the $100, the remaining amount is $100 - $80 = $20 for Player 2.
